result.execSummary:
The defendant Phillip D. Bergquist was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Damage to Property, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Ashland County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Def to report to the DOC in Ashland within 24 hours!
If def is placed on probation or extended supervision & owes financial obligations ordered by the Court at the time of discharge, a civil judgment may be entered against the def for all unpaid financial obligations.
  While on supervision the Def is to pay their financial obligations thru the Clerk of Court, which may include payments on restitution, fines, costs, surcharges, etc that are court ordered.
The payments are to be paid directly to the Clerk of Court Office at:
Ashland Co Clerk of Circuit Court
201 Main Street West - Room 307
Ashland, WI  54806

miscConds.notes: all financial obligations are to be paid at the rate of $20 per month beginning 8/1/16
Def to obtain a mental health evaluation & follow all recommendations. Defendant has 30 days to complete assessment. He may petition the court of additional time if needed.

NO CONTACT WITH H.M. OR HER RESIDENCE
NO CONTACT WITH J.V. OR HIS RESIDENCE
NO CONTACT WITH 701 11TH AVE W ASHLAND
NO CONTACT WITH SUPER H FOODS OF ASHLAND
  The Def is to take all medications as prescribed by treating physician and only in the manner & dosage as prescribed!
  Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia or any mind altering substances (MAS).  MAS means alcoholic beverages, controlled substances other than those prescribed by treating physician to the Def & taken only as prescribed, inhalants, synthetic marijuana or a similar substance, and/or over-the-counter medications used contrary to label instructions.  THE DEFENDANT IS TO MAINTAIN ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.
The Defendant shall not enter any bars, taverns, liquor stores (any place where the primary purpose is the sale of alcohol) or where mind altering substances are present, consumed or sold..
  The Def is subject to random UA testing.
  The Def is to provide a DNA specimen to the Ashland County Jail
Contact New Horizons, within one week, to set up appointment for available services.
Undergo alcohol/drug assessment and complete recommended treatment-responsible for finding the funding for any treatment/counseling recommended within 30 days.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist in court with attorney T. Gregory Amann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty has not rec'd offer yet, nor has he rec'd disc.  No obj to set hring on mo & ph.  PH in 16 CF 118 and ALL others that need PH will be scheduled that way & others DEJ cases moved to 2/14 @ 11:45 am & other dte is off.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 14, 2017 at 11:45 am.

Cases -- 16CF110,16CF118,16CF119,16CF183,16CF196,16CM93,16CM94. Attorney T. Gregory Amann in courtvia phone.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def was required to appear in person. Atty comments Def was supposed to be here if released. Def is not released yet. Atty will call def and call us back. -- Def joins telephonically with atty. No activity since def went into treatment program. No date sched for treatment to be completed. State comments filed motion to vacate DEJ's new chgs pending no prelim or aia sched for those. 16CF196. will waive time limits for those 2 cases- might waive prleim. Def waives time limts for both cases - know and vol waives time limits for prelim.  Status conference scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 12:00 pm.

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. needs to have initial contact w/probation  Probation review hearing scheduled for September 13, 2016 at 10:30 am.
def copy of offer to settle and TAD DEJ agreement

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist in court with attorney T Gregory Amann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. ADA has agreement, still waiting on administrative fee, state is willing to proceed if waiting a week to recieve payment is acceptable. Atty Amann states this is agreement. Plea G. 16CF110 ct 3 DRI, 16CF118 Ct2 DRI, 16CF119 2,3,6 DRI.
State has complied with victim rights
Ct accepts TAD deferred entry of judgment agreement. ADA comments on modifying bail 16CF119 amending cash bail to signature bond . Ct orders bail in 16CF119 is now part of bond in 16CF118. Any non monetary conditions in 16CF119 remain in effect and are now part of that bond.
Def adj g remaining counts-sent WH 2yr prob conditions,see attachment. Atty Amann requests costs/surcharges in some cases be waived.
Ct orders CC and surcharges on each count. 
Atty Amann comments on time served additional time served
  Probation review hearing scheduled for August 15, 2016 at 09:45 am.  Days to pay scheduled for August 28, 2016 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist in court with attorney T Gregory Amann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Waiver of prelim in each case. Ct finds prob cause, cases bound over. Information filed in each case. STC all cases  Status conference scheduled for June 28, 2016 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist in court by video with attorney T Gregory Amann.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Def rec copy of each comp, Atty Amann wants prelim.  6/22 3:00 other cases to track. Motion for bail modification to be heard at that time. Ct comments TAD assessment would be helpful.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 22, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist appeared by video means. Prosecuting Atty Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for State of Wisconsin. Has atty Amman, unable to contact. Ct will try to contact atty for scheduling
  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 9, 2016 at 09:45 am.

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist in court via v/con from ACJ.  Ruth Diane Kressel appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Larry Mcdunnen will not represent him. has contacted Pub def office. Perrine said they are looking for an attorney.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 6, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Phillip D. Bergquist in court by video from ACJ.  Kelly J Mcknight appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty is Larry McDonough (sp?) has not been able to get ahold of atty doesnt have his phone number. Ct attempts to contact atty and leaves message. Atty may appr by phone if representing def. Is eligible for TAD.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 27, 2016 at 09:00 am.
